== Partnerships with local computer stores ==

Many of our most likely new members and new Ubuntu users will be the kinds of computer users that shop at local hobbyist stores.  In addition, employees and owners of these stores frequently build fairly close relationships with their regular customers.  Establishing a presence in these locations can help to get the word out.

=== Possible Computer Store Initiatives ===
* Meeting and Event Flyers
* Ubuntu CDs
* Talks/Demos/Classes

=== Locations ===
If you know a local store that is not on this list, please email Songwind or edit the wiki directly to add it.
